Class BBjGridExWidget

  • java.lang.Object
    • BBjWidget
      • BBjGridExWidget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BBjGridExWidgetColumnsManagerInterface

    public class BBjGridExWidget
extends BBjWidget
implements BBjGridExWidgetColumnsManagerInterface
    An Advanced BBj Data Grid / Data Table Widget

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      BBjNumber AccentedSort!
      Set to true to specify that the sort should take into account accented characters, if this feature is turned on the sort will perform slower.
      BBjNumber AlwaysShowVerticalScroll!
      Set to true to always show the vertical scrollbar.
      BBjNumber AnimateRows!
      Set to true to enable Row Animation.
      BBjGridExWidgetAutoGroupColumn AutoGroupColumnDefinition!
      Allows specifying the group 'auto column' if you are not happy with the default.
      BBjNumber AutoSizePadding!
      How many pixels to add to a column width after the auto-sizing calculation.
      BBjGridContextMenu ContextMenu!
      The grid context menu
      static BBjNumber Debug
      When true enable debug mode , disable otherwise
      BBjGridExWidgetDefaultColumnDefinition DefaultColumnDefinition!
      Contains column properties all columns will inherit.
      BBjGridExWidgetDefaultColumnGroup DefaultColumnGroupDefinition!
      Contains column group properties all column groups will inherit.
      BBjString EditType!
      Set to 'fullRow' to enable Full Row Editing.
      BBjNumber EnableBrowserTooltips!
      Set to true to use the browser's default tooltip instead of using Ag-Grid's Tooltip Component.
      BBjNumber EnableFloatingFilter!
      When true enables the floating filters , disable otherwise
      BBjNumber EnableRtl!
      Set to true to operate grid in RTL (Right to Left) mode.
      BBjNumber EnterMovesDown!
      Set to true to have Enter key move focus to the cell below if not editing.
      BBjNumber EnterMovesDownAfterEdit!
      Set to true to have Enter key move focus to the cell below after Enter is pressed while editing.
      BBjNumber FloatingFiltersHeight!
      The height for the row containing the floating filters.
      BBjNumber FunctionsReadOnly!
      If true, then row group, pivot and value aggregation will be read only from the UI.
      BBjString GRIDID$
      Unique auto generate id for the grid instance.
      BBjNumber GroupDefaultExpanded!
      If grouping, set to the number of levels to expand by default.
      BBjNumber GroupHeaderHeight!
      The height for the rows containing header column groups.
      BBjNumber GroupHideOpenParents!
      Set to true to hide parents that are open.
      BBjNumber GroupIncludeFooter!
      If grouping, whether to show a group footer when the group is expanded.
      BBjNumber GroupIncludeTotalFooter!
      Set to true to show a 'grand' total group footer across all groups.
      BBjNumber GroupMultiAutoColumn!
      If using auto column, set to true to have each group in its own column separate column, eg if group by Country then Year, two auto columns will be created, one for country and one for year
      BBjNumber GroupRemoveLowestSingleChildren!
      Set to true to collapse lowest level groups that only have one child.
      BBjNumber GroupRemoveSingleChildren!
      Set to true to collapse groups that only have one child.
      BBjNumber GroupSelectsChildren!
      When true, selecting a group will have the impact of selecting all its children When false, then the group is selectable independently of the child nodes.
      BBjNumber GroupSelectsFiltered!
      If using groupSelectsChildren, then only the children that pass the current filter will get selected
      BBjNumber GroupSuppressAutoColumn!
      If true, the grid will not swap in the grouping column when grouping is enabled.
      BBjNumber GroupSuppressBlankHeader!
      If true, and showing footer, aggregate data will be displayed at both the header and footer levels always.
      BBjNumber GroupSuppressRow!
      If true, the group row won't be displayed and the groups will be expanded by default with no ability to expand / contract the groups.
      BBjNumber GroupUseEntireRow!
      If grouping, set to true or false (default is false).
      BBjNumber HeaderHeight!
      The height for the row containing the column label header.
      JsonObject Icons!
      Icons to use inside the grid instead of the grid's default icons.
      static BBjString LicenseKey$
      The Grid enterprise key
      BBjNumber MultipleSelection!
      Allow selection of multiple cells or rows.
      BBjString NavigationBehavior!
      Defines how users can move between rows using arrow keys.
      BBjNumber PivotGroupHeaderHeight!
      The height for the row containing header column groups when in pivot mode.
      BBjNumber PivotHeaderHeight!
      The height for the row containing the columns when in pivot mode.
      BBjNumber PivotMode!
      Set to true to enable pivot mode
      BBjNumber PivotPanelShow!
      When to show the 'pivot panel' (where you drag rows to pivot) at the top.
      BBjNumber RememberGroupStateWhenNewData!
      When true, if you set new data into the grid and have groups open, the grid will keep groups open if they exist in the new dataset
      java.util.ArrayList RowClass!
      Property to set CSS class for all rows
      JsonObject RowClassRules!
      Rules which can be applied to include certain CSS classes for rows
      BBjNumber RowDeselection!
      Set to true or false.
      BBjString RowGroupPanelShow!
      When to show the 'row group panel' (where you drag rows to group) at the top.
      BBjNumber RowHeight!
      Default Row Height in pixels.
      BBjNumber RowMultiSelectWithClick!
      Set to true to allow multiple rows to be selected with a single click.
      BBjString RowNodeId$
      The unique string to use as row inedx.
      JsonObject RowStyle!
      Property to set style for all rows.
      ResultSet RS!
      The resultset instance
      BBjNumber ShowHeaderSelectionCheckbox!
      When true, selection box will be show on the first column's header When false, no checkbox will be displayed.
      BBjNumber ShowSelectionCheckbox!
      When true, A selection box will be shown on the first column When false, no checkbox will be displayed.
      BBjNumber SingleClickEdit!
      Set to true to enable Single Click Editing for cells, to start editing with a single click.
      BBjNumber StopEditingWhenGridLosesFocus!
      Set this to true to stop cell editing when grid loses focus.
      BBjNumber SuppressAggAtRootLevel!
      When true, the aggregations won't be computed for root node of the grid
      BBjNumber SuppressAggFuncInHeader!
      When true, column headers won't include the aggFunc, eg 'sum(Bank Balance)' will just be 'Bank Balance'.
      BBjNumber SuppressAnimationFrame!
      When true, the grid will not use animation frames when drawing rows while scrolling.
      BBjNumber SuppressAutoSize!
      Suppresses auto-sizing columns for columns.
      BBjNumber SuppressClickEdit!
      Set to true so that neither single or double click starts editing.
      BBjNumber SuppressColumnMoveAnimation!
      If true, the ag-column-moving class is not added to the grid while columns are moving.
      BBjNumber SuppressContextMenu!
      Set to true to not show context menu.
      BBjNumber SuppressDragLeaveHidesColumns!
      If true, when you drag a column out of the grid (eg to the group zone) the column is not hidden.
      BBjNumber SuppressMaintainUnsortedOrder!
      Set to true to suppress sorting of un-sorted data to match original row data
      BBjNumber SuppressMakeVisibleAfterUnGroup!
      By default when a column is un-grouped, it is made visible.
      BBjNumber SuppressMenuHide!
      Set to true to always show the column menu button, rather than only showing when the mouse is over the column header.
      BBjNumber SuppressMiddleClickScrolls!
      If true, then middle clicks will result in 'click' events for cell and row.
      BBjNumber SuppressMovableColumns!
      Set to true to suppress column moving.
      BBjNumber SuppressMultiSort!
      Set to true to suppress multi-sort when the user shift-clicks a column header.
      BBjNumber SuppressRowClickSelection!
      If true, rows won't be selected when clicked.
      BBjNumber SuppressRowHoverHighlight!
      Set to true to not highlight rows by adding the ag-row-hover CSS class.
      BBjNumber SuppressScrollOnNewData!
      When true, the grid will not scroll to the top when new row data is provided.
      BBjNumber SuppressSetColumnStateEvents!
      Set to true to suppress column events being raised when state is changed throw the API methods
      BBjNumber SuppressTouch!
      Disables touch support (but does not remove the browsers efforts to simulate mouse events on touch).
      BBjNumber UnSortIcon!
      Set to true to show the 'no sort' icon.

    • Field Detail

      • GRIDID$

        public BBjString GRIDID$
        Unique auto generate id for the grid instance. This id is used in the client to distinguish instances

      • LicenseKey$

        public static BBjString LicenseKey$
        The Grid enterprise key

      • DefaultColumnDefinition!

        public BBjGridExWidgetDefaultColumnDefinition DefaultColumnDefinition!
        Contains column properties all columns will inherit.

      • DefaultColumnGroupDefinition!

        public BBjGridExWidgetDefaultColumnGroup DefaultColumnGroupDefinition!
        Contains column group properties all column groups will inherit.

      • SuppressAutoSize!

        public BBjNumber SuppressAutoSize!
        Suppresses auto-sizing columns for columns. In other words, double clicking a columns headers edge will not auto-size.Default is false

      • AutoSizePadding!

        public BBjNumber AutoSizePadding!
        How many pixels to add to a column width after the auto-sizing calculation. The default is 4 pixels. Set this if you want to add extra room to accommodate (for example) sort icons, or some other dynamic nature of the header.

      • SuppressColumnMoveAnimation!

        public BBjNumber SuppressColumnMoveAnimation!
        If true, the ag-column-moving class is not added to the grid while columns are moving. In the default themes, this transpires to no animation for moving columns.

      • SuppressMovableColumns!

        public BBjNumber SuppressMovableColumns!
        Set to true to suppress column moving. In other words, set to true to make the columns fixed position.

      • UnSortIcon!

        public BBjNumber UnSortIcon!
        Set to true to show the 'no sort' icon.

      • SuppressMultiSort!

        public BBjNumber SuppressMultiSort!
        Set to true to suppress multi-sort when the user shift-clicks a column header.

      • SuppressMenuHide!

        public BBjNumber SuppressMenuHide!
        Set to true to always show the column menu button, rather than only showing when the mouse is over the column header.

      • AutoGroupColumnDefinition!

        public BBjGridExWidgetAutoGroupColumn AutoGroupColumnDefinition!
        Allows specifying the group 'auto column' if you are not happy with the default. If grouping, this column def is included as the first column definition in the grid. If not grouping, this column is not included.

      • SuppressSetColumnStateEvents!

        public BBjNumber SuppressSetColumnStateEvents!
        Set to true to suppress column events being raised when state is changed throw the API methods

      • AccentedSort!

        public BBjNumber AccentedSort!
        Set to true to specify that the sort should take into account accented characters, if this feature is turned on the sort will perform slower.

      • SuppressMaintainUnsortedOrder!

        public BBjNumber SuppressMaintainUnsortedOrder!
        Set to true to suppress sorting of un-sorted data to match original row data

      • MultipleSelection!

        public BBjNumber MultipleSelection!
        Allow selection of multiple cells or rows. When true enable multiselection , disable otherwise

      • RowMultiSelectWithClick!

        public BBjNumber RowMultiSelectWithClick!
        Set to true to allow multiple rows to be selected with a single click. E.g. if you click select one row, then click select another row, the first row will keep it's selection. Clicking a selected row in this mode will deselect the row. This is useful for touch devices where ctrl and shift clicking is not an option.< Note that Despite the setting name , it works when MultipleSelection is enabled or disabled

      • RowDeselection!

        public BBjNumber RowDeselection!
        Set to true or false. If true, then rows will be deselected if you hold down ctrl + click the row. Normal behaviour with the grid disallows deselection of nodes (ie once a row is selected, it remains selected until another row is selected in its place).

      • SuppressRowClickSelection!

        public BBjNumber SuppressRowClickSelection!
        If true, rows won't be selected when clicked. Use, for example, when you want checkbox selection, and don't want to also select when the row is clicked.

      • SingleClickEdit!

        public BBjNumber SingleClickEdit!
        Set to true to enable Single Click Editing for cells, to start editing with a single click.

      • SuppressClickEdit!

        public BBjNumber SuppressClickEdit!
        Set to true so that neither single or double click starts editing.

      • EditType!

        public BBjString EditType!
        Set to 'fullRow' to enable Full Row Editing. Otherwise leave blank to edit one cell at a time.
        See Also:
        GRID_EDITTYPE_ROW(), GRID_EDITTYPE_CELL()

      • StopEditingWhenGridLosesFocus!

        public BBjNumber StopEditingWhenGridLosesFocus!
        Set this to true to stop cell editing when grid loses focus. The default is the grid stays editing until focus goes onto another cell. For inline (non-popup) editors only.

      • EnterMovesDown!

        public BBjNumber EnterMovesDown!
        Set to true to have Enter key move focus to the cell below if not editing. The default is Enter key starts editing the currently focused cell.

      • EnterMovesDownAfterEdit!

        public BBjNumber EnterMovesDownAfterEdit!
        Set to true to have Enter key move focus to the cell below after Enter is pressed while editing. The default is editing will stop and focus will remain on the editing cell.

      • HeaderHeight!

        public BBjNumber HeaderHeight!
        The height for the row containing the column label header. If not specified the default is 25px.

      • GroupHeaderHeight!

        public BBjNumber GroupHeaderHeight!
        The height for the rows containing header column groups. If not specified, it uses headerHeight

      • FloatingFiltersHeight!

        public BBjNumber FloatingFiltersHeight!
        The height for the row containing the floating filters. If not specified the default is 20px.

      • PivotHeaderHeight!

        public BBjNumber PivotHeaderHeight!
        The height for the row containing the columns when in pivot mode. If not specified, it uses headerHeight.

      • PivotGroupHeaderHeight!

        public BBjNumber PivotGroupHeaderHeight!
        The height for the row containing header column groups when in pivot mode. If not specified, it uses groupHeaderHeight

      • GroupUseEntireRow!

        public BBjNumber GroupUseEntireRow!
        If grouping, set to true or false (default is false). If true, a group row will span all columns across the entire width of the table. If false, the cells will be rendered as normal and you will have the opportunity to include a grouping column (normally the first on the left) to show the group

      • GroupDefaultExpanded!

        public BBjNumber GroupDefaultExpanded!
        If grouping, set to the number of levels to expand by default. Eg 0 for none, 1 first level only, etc. Default is 0 (expand none). Set to -1 for expand everything

      • GroupSuppressAutoColumn!

        public BBjNumber GroupSuppressAutoColumn!
        If true, the grid will not swap in the grouping column when grouping is enabled. Use this if you want complete control on the column displayed and don't want the grids help. In other words, you already have a column in your column definitions that is responsible for displaying the groups

      • GroupMultiAutoColumn!

        public BBjNumber GroupMultiAutoColumn!
        If using auto column, set to true to have each group in its own column separate column, eg if group by Country then Year, two auto columns will be created, one for country and one for year

      • GroupSuppressRow!

        public BBjNumber GroupSuppressRow!
        If true, the group row won't be displayed and the groups will be expanded by default with no ability to expand / contract the groups. Useful when you want to just 'group' the rows, but not add parent group row to each group

      • GroupSelectsChildren!

        public BBjNumber GroupSelectsChildren!
        When true, selecting a group will have the impact of selecting all its children When false, then the group is selectable independently of the child nodes. NoteThat this settings has no effect if MultipleSelection is disabled

      • GroupIncludeFooter!

        public BBjNumber GroupIncludeFooter!
        If grouping, whether to show a group footer when the group is expanded. If true, then by default, the footer will contain aggregate data (if any) when shown and the header will be blank. When closed, the header will contain the aggregate data regardless of this setting (as footer is hidden anyway). This is handy for 'total' rows, that are displayed below the data when the group is open, and alongside the group when it is closed

      • GroupIncludeTotalFooter!

        public BBjNumber GroupIncludeTotalFooter!
        Set to true to show a 'grand' total group footer across all groups.

      • GroupSuppressBlankHeader!

        public BBjNumber GroupSuppressBlankHeader!
        If true, and showing footer, aggregate data will be displayed at both the header and footer levels always. This stops the possibly undesirable behaviour of the header details 'jumping' to the footer on expand.

      • GroupSelectsFiltered!

        public BBjNumber GroupSelectsFiltered!
        If using groupSelectsChildren, then only the children that pass the current filter will get selected

      • GroupRemoveSingleChildren!

        public BBjNumber GroupRemoveSingleChildren!
        Set to true to collapse groups that only have one child.

      • GroupRemoveLowestSingleChildren!

        public BBjNumber GroupRemoveLowestSingleChildren!
        Set to true to collapse lowest level groups that only have one child.

      • GroupHideOpenParents!

        public BBjNumber GroupHideOpenParents!
        Set to true to hide parents that are open. When used with multiple columns for showing groups, it can give more pleasing user experience

      • RowGroupPanelShow!

        public BBjString RowGroupPanelShow!
        When to show the 'row group panel' (where you drag rows to group) at the top. Default is never. Set to either 'always' or 'onlyWhenGrouping'
        See Also:
        GRID_GROUPPANEL_SHOW_HIDDEN(), GRID_GROUPPANEL_SHOW_VISIBLE(), GRID_GROUPPANEL_SHOW_ONGROUPING()

      • PivotMode!

        public BBjNumber PivotMode!
        Set to true to enable pivot mode

      • PivotPanelShow!

        public BBjNumber PivotPanelShow!
        When to show the 'pivot panel' (where you drag rows to pivot) at the top. Default is never. Set to either 'always' or 'onlyWhenPivoting'. Note that the pivot panel will never show if pivotMode is off.
        See Also:
        GRID_GROUPPANEL_SHOW_HIDDEN(), GRID_GROUPPANEL_SHOW_VISIBLE(), GRID_GROUPPANEL_SHOW_ONGROUPING()

      • RememberGroupStateWhenNewData!

        public BBjNumber RememberGroupStateWhenNewData!
        When true, if you set new data into the grid and have groups open, the grid will keep groups open if they exist in the new dataset

      • SuppressAggFuncInHeader!

        public BBjNumber SuppressAggFuncInHeader!
        When true, column headers won't include the aggFunc, eg 'sum(Bank Balance)' will just be 'Bank Balance'.

      • SuppressAggAtRootLevel!

        public BBjNumber SuppressAggAtRootLevel!
        When true, the aggregations won't be computed for root node of the grid

      • FunctionsReadOnly!

        public BBjNumber FunctionsReadOnly!
        If true, then row group, pivot and value aggregation will be read only from the UI. The grid will display what values are used for each, but will not allow the use to change the selection

      • SuppressMakeVisibleAfterUnGroup!

        public BBjNumber SuppressMakeVisibleAfterUnGroup!
        By default when a column is un-grouped, it is made visible. This property stops the column becoming visible again when un-grouping.

      • AlwaysShowVerticalScroll!

        public BBjNumber AlwaysShowVerticalScroll!
        Set to true to always show the vertical scrollbar.

      • SuppressScrollOnNewData!

        public BBjNumber SuppressScrollOnNewData!
        When true, the grid will not scroll to the top when new row data is provided. Use this if you don't want the default behaviour of scrolling to the top every time you load new data.

      • SuppressAnimationFrame!

        public BBjNumber SuppressAnimationFrame!
        When true, the grid will not use animation frames when drawing rows while scrolling. Use this if the grid is working fast enough that you don't need animations frame and you don't want the grid to flicker.

      • Icons!

        public JsonObject Icons!
        Icons to use inside the grid instead of the grid's default icons.

      • RowHeight!

        public BBjNumber RowHeight!
        Default Row Height in pixels. Default is 25 pixels.

      • AnimateRows!

        public BBjNumber AnimateRows!
        Set to true to enable Row Animation.

      • RowStyle!

        public JsonObject RowStyle!
        Property to set style for all rows. Set to an object of key (style names) and values (style values)

      • RowClass!

        public java.util.ArrayList RowClass!
        Property to set CSS class for all rows

      • RowClassRules!

        public JsonObject RowClassRules!
        Rules which can be applied to include certain CSS classes for rows
        See Also:
        https://www.ag-grid.com/javascript-grid-row-styles/#row-class-rules

      • SuppressRowHoverHighlight!

        public BBjNumber SuppressRowHoverHighlight!
        Set to true to not highlight rows by adding the ag-row-hover CSS class.

      • SuppressMiddleClickScrolls!

        public BBjNumber SuppressMiddleClickScrolls!
        If true, then middle clicks will result in 'click' events for cell and row. Otherwise the browser will use middle click to scroll the grid.

      • EnableBrowserTooltips!

        public BBjNumber EnableBrowserTooltips!
        Set to true to use the browser's default tooltip instead of using Ag-Grid's Tooltip Component.

      • SuppressDragLeaveHidesColumns!

        public BBjNumber SuppressDragLeaveHidesColumns!
        If true, when you drag a column out of the grid (eg to the group zone) the column is not hidden.

      • EnableRtl!

        public BBjNumber EnableRtl!
        Set to true to operate grid in RTL (Right to Left) mode.

      • SuppressContextMenu!

        public BBjNumber SuppressContextMenu!
        Set to true to not show context menu. Use if you don't want to use the default 'right click' context menu.

      • SuppressTouch!

        public BBjNumber SuppressTouch!
        Disables touch support (but does not remove the browsers efforts to simulate mouse events on touch).

      • EnableFloatingFilter!

        public BBjNumber EnableFloatingFilter!
        When true enables the floating filters , disable otherwise

      • ShowSelectionCheckbox!

        public BBjNumber ShowSelectionCheckbox!
        When true, A selection box will be shown on the first column When false, no checkbox will be displayed. Note The first column can override this settings when it sets the CheckboxSelection to true

      • ShowHeaderSelectionCheckbox!

        public BBjNumber ShowHeaderSelectionCheckbox!
        When true, selection box will be show on the first column's header When false, no checkbox will be displayed. Note The first column can override this settings when it sets the tHeaderCheckboxSelection to true Note This option will ignore multi row selection option by default so it is always enabled

      • NavigationBehavior!

        public BBjString NavigationBehavior!
        Defines how users can move between rows using arrow keys.
        See Also:
        GRID_NAVIGATION_BEHAVIOUR_NEXT_ROW(), GRID_NAVIGATION_BEHAVIOUR_NEXT_CELL()

      • ContextMenu!

        public BBjGridContextMenu ContextMenu!
        The grid context menu

      • RS!

        public ResultSet RS!
        The resultset instance

      • RowNodeId$

        public BBjString RowNodeId$
        The unique string to use as row inedx. defualt is __ROW_INDEX

      • Debug

        public static BBjNumber Debug
        When true enable debug mode , disable otherwise

      • render

        public void render()
        Render the grid The method will compose the grid config and send it to the client for a full rerender. You can use this method to force the client render after you update a setup configuration (ex: column defintions)

      • setData

        public void setData(ResultSet rs!,
BBjNumber render!,
BBjNumber all!)
        Feed the grid with data The method will sync the result set column defintions with the current column defintions , update the data and render the grid on the client
        Parameters:
        ResultSet - rs! ResultSet with the data
        BBjNumber - render! When true the grid will render direclty on the client , otherwise you need to call render() direclty
        BBjNumber - addAll! When true , We will create a column defintion for every column in the resultset , otherwise update the existing ones only
        See Also:
        render()

      • setData

        public void setData(ResultSet rs!,
BBjNumber render!)
        Feed the grid with data The method will sync the result set column defintions with the current column defintions , update the data and render the grid on the client
        Parameters:
        ResultSet - rs! ResultSet with the data
        BBjNumber - render! When true the grid will render direclty on the client , otherwise you need to call render() direclty
        See Also:
        render()

BBjString indexdBy$)
        Feed the grid with data
        Parameters:

        BBjString - indexdBy$ The field used for creating the unique row index

        public void setData(ResultSet rs!)

      • setRowsData

        public void setRowsData(ResultSet rs!)
        Feed the grid with a new rows set Unlike the setData method, this one will update the grid with a new rows set(ResultSet) without doing a full rerender. The column defintion will not be synced from the passed ResultSet in this case. Use this method in case you want to replace the whole data in the grid at once.
        Parameters:
        ResultSet - rs! ResultSet with the data
        See Also:
        setData()

      • setVisibleRow

        public void setVisibleRow(BBjNumber index!,
BBjString position!)
        Set visible row Ensures the row index is visible by vertically scrolling the grid. The valid values for positions are {'top', 'middle', 'bottom'}. If top, middle or bottom, the grid will scroll the row to place the row at top, middle or bottom
        Parameters:
        BBjNumber - index!: the row index
        BBjString - position!: the scrolling poistion
        See Also:
        GRID_ROWPOS_TOP(), GRID_ROWPOS_MIDDLE(), GRID_ROWPOS_BOTTOM()

      • setFunctionsReadOnly

        public void setFunctionsReadOnly(BBjNumber readonly!)
        If true, then row group, pivot and value aggregation will be read only from the Ui. The grid will display what values are used for each, but will not allow the use to change the selection
        Parameters:
        BBjNumber - readonly! when true disable , enable otherwise
